p: Fresh leaves of S. scordifolia were collected in Haiyuan County of Ningxia province, China (105°38′E, 36°21′N) and dried with silica gel. The voucher specimen was stored in Sichuan University Herbarium (JQ13383018). Total genomic DNA was extracted with a modified CTAB method (Doyle and Doyle 1987) and a 350-bp library was constructed. This library was sequenced on the Illumina NovaSeq 6000 system with 150 bp paired-end reads. We obtained 10 million high quality pair-end reads from S. scordifolia, and after removing the adapters, the remained reads were used to assemble the complete chloroplast genome by NOVOPlasty (Dierckxsens et al. 2017). The complete chloroplast genome of S. insignis was used as a reference. Plann v1.1 (Huang and CronK 2015) and Geneious v11.0.3 (Kearse et al. 2012) were used to annotate the chloroplasts genome and correct the annotation.
